Scroll

we propose

Dive in the magic and charm of the Amati oak forest. Spending the night at the top of a majestic tree is a unique experience that will not leave you indifferent. Relax, unwind, reconnect, …maybe fall in love. Abandon yourself to the sensations and allow the presence of the forest capture you.
We put the forest, the story is up to you.

Scroll

we offer

Four lovely double suites built high on the branches of oak trees. Each suite has a balcony, dry bath, heating and other amenities for your stay."" Breakfast is delivered to your suite in a basket that you can pull up with a rope. Dinner is served at Amati House. Breakfasts and dinners are made ​​with locally source natural products and you may add some nice wine, a bottle of champagne, other drinks ...
The story is up to you ...

Scroll

The Amati oak forest is a small ecological treasure and a protected environment with particular ornithological interest. This humid oak is unique to areas of Alava and Navarra, a relic of an era when such forest covered entire valleys in Ultzama and Basaburua.

The Amati oak forest is in Lizaso, in the heart of Ultzama Valley in Navarre... Ultzama is a beautiful valley with a mild clime located 30 minutes from Pamplona and 50 minutes from San Sebastian. It is a valley of great beauty that combines ancient traditions and nature characterized by green meadows and dense forests. This valley is also known for its mycological and birdlife values. The area also offers many outdoor activities: sightseeing, hiking, horseback riding

See map

Scroll

about us

We love to work and live in nature. Although we have our feet on the ground, we also like to climb trees. In 2003 we created a pioneering company in construction of adventure parks on trees. Since then we have built several adventure parks as well as natural wooden paths on trees. Soon the idea of ​​going further came up and we asked ourselves for the possibility of sleeping on top of a tree. How would be the experience of being completely immersed in the woods? Thus Basoa Suites began to take shape.

Scroll

commitments

At Basoa Suites we believe in a different kind of tourism and thus promote sustainable and respectful tourism. We chose materials and construction techniques that cause minimal impact on the tree and the environment. Our constructions in trees are supervised by specialists that guide us about the type of anchors, allowable loads and the election of the trees we use to sustain our structures in order not to damage them. Our suites have a dry toilet system to avoid the installation of pipes and drains into the forest. We have also built elevated wooden walkways to prevent soil compaction, direct the traffic of people to the paths and ensure that the soil and plants do not suffer the impact of our presence. Finally, we promote the observation of forest under the belief that the more we know about the forests better we take care of them.

Gift card

To give basoa suites is giving a unique experience. Now we personalize your gift. Here we go. Choose one of our suites:

Suite Belea

This beautiful suite is decorated with many wooden details. It is bright with windows on all walls to observe the majestic oaks that surround the room and features a pagoda-shaped roof. It has the most spacious interior of all suites and is the only one where we can stay with children.

Availability and booking
‹ ›

Suite Beigorri

This is a warm and cozy nest built 5.5 meters above the ground, perfect to escape the monotony and shelter during the cold winter days. It is accessed by a ladder with hatch and has a small terrace to enjoy all year.

Disponibilidad y reservas
‹ ›

Suite Okolin

It has a wide balcony that wraps around the room in three sides. A small porch allows to enjoy the outdoor even in rainy days. Two great oaks pierce the balcony floor and allow us to admire them up close. It has large windows with breathtaking views of the forest. It has a triangular floor plan, resembling the nearby Okolin peak.

Disponibilidad y reservas
‹ ›

Suite bedats

With an original finish on the ceiling this exquisitely decorated room is our most luxurious Suite. The large windows that cover all walls fill the room with light. It is fully integrated with the wildest part of the forest to enjoy and watch from its large terrace.

Disponibilidad y reservas
‹ ›

amati house

Reaching Basoa Suites we will receive you in the Amati House services building. It is located next to the suites and has showers, living room and dining room. Here you will get directions to your suite and you can also enjoy a special dinner. The story is up to you.
